head.title: QR Code Generator and Guest List Management
head.description: GATE:QR lets you generate guest lists from CSV files, offering printable QR codes and a web-based scanner for seamless check-in at your event gates.

index.h1: The all-in-one solution for managing entrance access.
index.h2: You provide the guest list with fields you want. We provide <2>print-ready</2> <3>QR codes</3> to deliver plus a <5>web-based</5> <6>QR Code scanner</6> to scan them.

Dropzone.drop: Drop a <1>*.csv</1> file here<3/>or <5>click</5> to select it from disk.

Reset.title: Are you absolutely sure?
Reset.description: Would you like to definitely reset all the guest list?

uploadSchema.size: File size must be less than 1MB
uploadSchema.type: File type must be of type *.csv
uploadSchema.shape: Use a *.csv file with max 4 columns
